articles.description: We'd promise you this isn't an April Fool's joke, but we're not so sure ourselves, to be frank
articles.content:
Remember that Seinfeld horror game designed in Dreams from about a year ago? No? Well, it's back regardless, and it's looking weirder than ever.
When I first covered Sinfeld Remastered (then called … [+2378 chars]
